meanings.definition: The treatment of disease, especially cancer, using radiation.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother underwent radiotherapy for her cancer.
meanings.sent2: The hospital offers radiotherapy as a treatment option for cancer patients.
meanings.sent3: After his radiotherapy sessions, John joked that he was now 'radiating positivity.'
meanings.sent4: The doctor described radiotherapy as a targeted beam of hope against the cancer cells.
meanings.sent5: The glowing light of radiotherapy fought bravely against the disease within.

meanings.definition: The use of ionizing radiation in the treatment of cancer.
meanings.sent1: The oncologist recommended radiotherapy to combat the tumor.
meanings.sent2: Patients may experience fatigue as a side effect of radiotherapy.
meanings.sent3: During the radiotherapy session, the machine hummed like a futuristic robot.
meanings.sent4: The precision of radiotherapy zapped the cancer cells with accuracy.
meanings.sent5: The powerful rays of radiotherapy penetrated deep to destroy the malignant growth.
